Data Fields

 Number of range bins.

 Number of doppler bins.
 
float rangeStep
 Range conversion factor for FFT range index to meters.
 
float dopplerStep
 Doppler conversion factor for Doppler FFT index to m/s.
 

Detailed Description

HWA CFAR static configuration.

The structure is used to hold the static configuration used for CFAR. The following condition must be satisfied:

   numRangeBins * numDopplerBins * sizeof(uint16_t) <= 32 KB (two HWA memory banks)
